qs: Number of anatomical entities per species and expression confidence ordered by species common name where the apoc1 gene is expressed
query:
PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> 
PREFIX genex:<http://purl.org/genex#> 
PREFIX obo:<http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX orth:<http://purl.org/net/orth#> 
select (count(?anatEntity) as ?c) ?specName ?confidence {
?seq a orth:Gene.
?expr genex:hasSequenceUnit ?seq.
?expr genex:hasConfidenceLevel ?confidence.
?seq rdfs:label ?geneName .
?expr genex:hasExpressionCondition ?cond.
?cond genex:hasAnatomicalEntity ?anatEntity.
?cond obo:RO_0002162 ?taxon. 
?taxon up:commonName ?specName.
FILTER (LCASE(?geneName) = 'apoc1' )}
group by ?taxon ?confidence ?specName
order by ?specName

qs: Anatomical entities at the mouse’s adult stage where the apoc1 gene is expressed
query:
PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> 
PREFIX genex:<http://purl.org/genex#> 
PREFIX obo:<http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX orth:<http://purl.org/net/orth#> 
select distinct ?anatEntity ?anatName {
?seq a orth:Gene.
?expr genex:hasSequenceUnit ?seq.
?seq rdfs:label ?geneName .
?expr genex:hasExpressionCondition ?cond.
?cond genex:hasAnatomicalEntity ?anatEntity.
?anatEntity rdfs:label ?anatName.
?cond genex:hasDevelopmentalStage ?stage.
?stage  rdfs:label  ?stageName.
?cond obo:RO_0002162 ?taxon. 
?taxon up:commonName 'mouse'.
FILTER ( contains(?stageName,'adult') && LCASE(?geneName) = 'apoc1' )}

qs: the scientific name of species in bgee and their corresponding taxon
List the labels and identifiers of fruit fly genes in bgee
query:
PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> 
PREFIX orth:<http://purl.org/net/orth#> 
PREFIX obo:<http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
select ?gene ?geneName {
?gene a orth:Gene .
 ?gene rdfs:label ?geneName .
    ?gene orth:organism ?taxon .
 ?taxon obo:RO_0002162 ?species . 
?taxon up:commonName 'fruit fly'.}

qs: Human anatomical entities at young adult developmental stage
query:
PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> 
PREFIX genex:<http://purl.org/genex#> 
PREFIX obo:<http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
select distinct ?anatName {
?cond genex:hasAnatomicalEntity ?anatEntity.
?anatEntity rdfs:label ?anatName.
?cond genex:hasDevelopmentalStage ?stage.
?stage  rdfs:label  ?stageName.
?cond obo:RO_0002162 ?taxon. 
?taxon up:commonName 'human'.
FILTER (contains(?stageName,"young") && contains(?stageName,"adult") )}

qs: In which species is the Mt-co1 gene present?
query:
PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> 
PREFIX orth:<http://purl.org/net/orth#> 
PREFIX obo:<http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
select ?name {
?gene a orth:Gene. 
 ?gene rdfs:label  ?geneName.
?gene orth:organism ?organism. 
?organism obo:RO_0002162 ?taxon.
?taxon up:scientificName ?name. 
  FILTER (UCASE(?geneName) = UCASE('Mt-co1') )}

qs: genes with lung in the description
query:
PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> 
PREFIX orth:<http://purl.org/net/orth#> 
PREFIX dcterms:<http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
select ?geneName ?geneId {
?gene a orth:Gene. 
 ?gene rdfs:label  ?geneName.
?gene dcterms:identifier ?geneId.
 ?gene dcterms:description ?desc.
 FILTER CONTAINS(?desc, 'lung')}

qs: Anatomical entities for which apoc1 is not expressed
query:
PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> 
PREFIX genex:<http://purl.org/genex#> 
PREFIX obo:<http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX orth:<http://purl.org/net/orth#> 
select ?anatEntity ?anatName {
?anatEntity a genex:AnatomicalEntity. 
?anatEntity rdfs:label ?anatName. 
FILTER NOT EXISTS {
?seq a orth:Gene.
?expr genex:hasSequenceUnit ?seq.
?seq rdfs:label ?geneName .
?expr genex:hasExpressionCondition ?cond.
?cond genex:hasAnatomicalEntity ?anatEntity.
?anatEntity a genex:AnatomicalEntity. 
FILTER (LCASE(?geneName) = 'apoc1' ) } 
}

query:
PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> 
PREFIX genex:<http://purl.org/genex#>

FILTER (LCASE(?geneName) = 'apoc1' )}

qs: Show all fruit fly genes
What are the taxa available in Bgee?
show fruit fly developmental stages
query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?develStage WHERE {
?expressioncondition <http://purl.org/genex#hasDevelopmentalStage> ?develStage.
?expressioncondition a <http://purl.org/genex#ExpressionCondition>.
?taxon <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/scientificName> ?speciesname.
?expressioncondition <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0002162> ?taxon.
?taxon <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/commonName> ?taxon_commonname.
FILTER (contains(lcase(str(?taxon_commonname)), "fruit fly"))
}

qs: Anatomical entities where FBgn0031395 is expressed
show mouse anatomical entities
rat's tp53 paralog genes that are expressed in the brain
genes in primates orthologous to a gene that is expressed in the fruit fly brain
paralogs of genes expressed in the liver of the rat
mouse proteins which are expressed in the liver and are orthologous to human INS protein .
The orthologs of a gene that is expressed in the fruit fly brain
Retrieve all proteins per species that are orthologous to Oryctolagus cuniculus' APOCI or APOC1 related protein and their cross reference to Uniprot including Ensembl gene identifier.
Retrieve proteins that are paralogous to ENSLACG00000002497
query:
prefix sio:<http://semanticscience.org/resource/>
select ?OMA_LINK 
where {
?cluster a orth:ParalogsCluster.
?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node1.
?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node2. 
?node2 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?protein2. 
?node1 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?protein1.
?protein1 sio:SIO_010079?gene . 
?gene lscr:xrefEnsemblGene  ensembl:ENSLACG00000002497.
?protein2 rdfs:seeAlso ?OMA_LINK. 
filter(?node1 != ?node2) 
}

qs: Retrieve Oryctolagus cuniculus' proteins encoded by genes that are orthologous to Mus musculus' HBB-Y gene and their cross reference links to Uniprot
query:
prefix sio:<http://semanticscience.org/resource/>
prefix obo:<http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
select distinct ?MOUSE_PROTEIN ?RABIT_PROTEIN ?MOUSE_UNIPROT_XREF ?RABIT_UNIPROT_XREF 
where {
?cluster a orth:OrthologsCluster.
?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node1.
?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node2. 
?node2 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?RABIT_PROTEIN. 
?node1 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?MOUSE_PROTEIN.
?MOUSE_PROTEIN a orth:Protein.
?MOUSE_PROTEIN  orth:organism/obo:RO_0002162/up:scientificName 'Mus musculus';
rdfs:label 'HBB-Y';
lscr:xrefUniprot ?MOUSE_UNIPROT_XREF.
?RABIT_PROTEIN a orth:Protein.
?RABIT_PROTEIN orth:organism/obo:RO_0002162/up:scientificName 'Oryctolagus cuniculus' .
?RABIT_PROTEIN lscr:xrefUniprot ?RABIT_UNIPROT_XREF.
filter(?node1 != ?node2)}

qs: Retrieve proteins that are paralogous to the human HBB and their cross reference to Uniprot.
query:
select ?protein2  ?Oma_link  ?Uniprot_link{
?cluster a orth:ParalogsCluster.
?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node1.
?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node2.
?node2 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?protein2.
?node1 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?protein1.
?protein1 a orth:Protein.
?protein1 rdfs:label 'HBB'. 
?protein1 orth:organism ?organism.
?inTaxon rdfs:label 'in taxon'@en.
?organism ?inTaxon ?taxon.
?taxon  up:scientificName 'Homo sapiens'.
?protein2 a orth:Protein. 
?protein2  lscr:xrefUniprot ?Uniprot_link. 
filter(?node1 != ?node2)
}

qs: show all drosophila species
Retrieve proteins that are orthologous to the human HBB and their cross reference to Uniprot.
query:
select ?protein2  ?Oma_link  ?Uniprot_link{
?cluster a orth:OrthologsCluster.
?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node1.
?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node2.
?node2 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?protein2.
?node1 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?protein1.
?protein1 a orth:Protein.
?protein1 rdfs:label 'HBB'. 
?protein1 orth:organism ?organism.
?inTaxon rdfs:label 'in taxon'@en.
?organism ?inTaxon ?taxon.
?taxon  up:scientificName 'Homo sapiens'.
?protein2 a orth:Protein. 
?protein2  lscr:xrefUniprot ?Uniprot_link. 
filter(?node1 != ?node2)
}

qs: show me all rat proteins
query:
select ?name 
where {
?protein a orth:Protein.
?protein  orth:organism ?organism.
?inTaxon rdfs:label 'in taxon'@en.
?organism ?inTaxon ?taxon.
?taxon  up:scientificName 'Rattus norvegicus'.
?protein rdfs:label ?name.
}

qs: What's the percentage of proteins in Drosophila melanogaster that have at least one paralogous protein?
query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX ensembl: <http://rdf.ebi.ac.uk/resource/ensembl/>
PREFIX oma: <http://omabrowser.org/ontology/oma#>
PREFIX orth: <http://purl.org/net/orth#>
PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/>
PREFIX taxon: <http://purl.uniprot.org/taxonomy/>
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX lscr: <http://purl.org/lscr#>
select (((xsd:float(?num_paralogy)*100)/xsd:float(?total)) as ?result) 
   where   { 
 { 
select (count(distinct ?PROTEIN) as ?num_paralogy ) 
    where { 
       ?cluster a orth:ParalogsCluster. 
       ?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node1. 
       ?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node2.  
       ?node2 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?PROTEIN.  
       ?node1 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?IS_PARALOGOUS_TO_PROTEIN. 
       ?PROTEIN a orth:Protein. 
       ?PROTEIN orth:organism/obo:RO_0002162/up:scientificName ?species. 
       ?IS_PARALOGOUS_TO_PROTEIN a orth:Protein. 
       ?IS_PARALOGOUS_TO_PROTEIN orth:organism/obo:RO_0002162/up:scientificName ?species . 
       values(?species ){( 'Drosophila melanogaster' )} 
       filter(?node1 != ?node2) } 
           } 
{ 
select (count(distinct ?protein_total) as ?total) where  
   {?protein_total a orth:Protein.  
    ?protein_total orth:organism/obo:RO_0002162/up:scientificName ?species. 
    values(?species ){( 'Drosophila melanogaster' )} 
    } 
}}

qs: How many proteins (and their labels) per species are present in OMA database?
query:
select ?taxon ?name count(?protein) as ?Protein_count
where {
?protein a orth:Protein.
?protein  orth:organism ?organism.
?inTaxon rdfs:label 'in taxon'@en.
?organism ?inTaxon ?taxon.
?taxon  up:scientificName ?name.
}group by ?taxon ?name

qs: Retrieve all proteins that are orthologous to ENSLACG00000002497
query:
prefix sio:<http://semanticscience.org/resource/>
select  ?OMA_LINK 
where {
?cluster a orth:OrthologsCluster.
?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node1.
?cluster orth:hasHomologousMember ?node2. 
?node2 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?protein2. 
?node1 orth:hasHomologousMember* ?protein1.
?protein1 sio:SIO_010079 ?gene . 
?gene lscr:xrefEnsemblGene  ensembl:ENSLACG00000002497.
?protein2 rdfs:seeAlso ?OMA_LINK. 
filter(?node1 != ?node2) 
}

qs: Which diseases are associated with SAR1B?
List the number of distinct side-effects of drugs which target genes whose general function involves cell division.
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?y) WHERE {?x <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#sameAs> ?z. ?z <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/sider/resource/sider/sideEffect> ?y. ?x <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/target> ?a. ?a <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/generalFunction> ?l. FILTER(contains(str(?l), cell division))}

qs: Which diseases have a class degree of 11?
Are there drugs that target the Protein kinase C beta type?
Which drugs have no side-effects?
Give me all diseases of the connective tissue class.
Which disease has the largest size?
query: SELECT DISTINCT ?k WHERE {?k <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/diseasome/resource/diseasome/size> ?l} ORDER BY DESC(?l) LIMIT 1

qs: Which drugs interact with food and have HIV infections as side-effects?
Give me diseases whose possible drugs target the elongation factor 2.
Which genes are associated with Endothelin receptor type B?
List drugs that lead to strokes and arthrosis.
Which drugs have bipolar disorder as indication?
query: SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE {?x <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/indication> ?k. FILTER (contains (str(?k), bipolar disorder)) }

qs: Which drugs have a water solubility of 2.78e-01 mg/mL?
Which targets are involved in blood clotting?
query: SELECT DISTINCT ?a WHERE {?a <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/generalFunction> ?l. FILTER(contains(str(?l), blood clotting))}

qs: Which drug has the highest number of side-effects?
query: SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE {?x <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/sider/resource/sider/sideEffect> ?y. } group by ?x order by desc(count(?y)) limit 1

qs: Which genes are associated with subtypes of rickets?
Give me the drug categories of Desoxyn.
Which approved drugs interact with fibers?
query: SELECT DISTINCT ?x WHERE {?x a <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/drugs>. ?x <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/drugType> <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugtype/approved>. ?x <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/foodInteraction> ?k. FILTER (contains(str(?k), fibers)) }

qs: Which drugs achieve a protein binding of 100%?
Give me drugs in the gaseous state.
Give me the side-effects drugs with a solubility of 3.24e-02 mg/mL.
Which experimental drugs interact with food?
List diseases whose possible drugs have no side effects.
List illnesses that are treated by drugs whose mechanism of action involves norepinephrine and serotonin.
query: SELECT DISTINCT ?a WHERE {?a <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/diseasome/resource/diseasome/possibleDrug> ?x. ?x <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/mechanismOfAction> ?y. FILTER(contains(str(?y), norepinephrine)) . FILTER(contains(str(?y), serotonin)) }

qs: Which is the least common chromosome location?
query: SELECT DISTINCT ?b WHERE {?a <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/chromosomeLocation> ?b } GROUP BY (?b) ORDER BY ASC(COUNT(?a)) LIMIT 1

qs: Give me diseases treated by tetracycline
What are the common side effects of Doxil and Bextra?
Which genes are associated with diseases whose possible drugs target Cubilin?
Which genes are associated with diseases treated with Cetuximab?
Which are the drugs whose side effects are associated with the gene TRPM6?
Which drugs have hypertension and vomiting as side-effects?
Which are targets of Hydroxocobalamin?
Which foods does allopurinol interact with?
What are enzymes of drugs used for anemia?
Which diseases is Cetuximab used for?
query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?v
WHERE {
        ?x rdfs:label ?l.
        FILTER(REGEX(?l,'Cetuximab','i')).
        ?x <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/possibleDiseaseTarget> ?v.
        ?v a <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/diseasome/resource/diseasome/diseases>.
}

qs: What are the side effects of Valdecoxib?
query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?x
WHERE {
        ?v1 rdfs:label ?l.
        FILTER(REGEX(?l,'Valdecoxib','i')).
        ?v2 <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#sameAs> ?v1.
        ?v2 <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/sider/resource/sider/sideEffect> ?x.
}

qs: Which are targets for possible drugs for diseases associated with the gene ALD?
Which genes are associated with breast cancer?
Which are possible drugs against rickets?
What is the side effects of drugs used for Tuberculosis?
query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?x
WHERE {
        <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/diseasome/resource/diseases/1154> <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/diseasome/resource/diseasome/possibleDrug> ?v2.
        ?v2 a <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/drugs>.
        ?v3 <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#sameAs> ?v2.
        ?v3 <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/sider/resource/sider/sideEffect> ?x.
}

qs: What are the diseases caused by Valdecoxib?
query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?x
WHERE {
        ?v1 rdfs:label ?l.
        FILTER(REGEX(?l,'Valdecoxib','i')).
        ?v2 <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#sameAs> ?v1.
        ?v2 <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/sider/resource/sider/sideEffect> ?x.
        ?x a ?c.
        ?c <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#sameAs> <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/diseasome/resource/diseasome/diseases>.
}
